Title: Power Outage
Description: There was a sudden power outage affecting the main office.

Title: Server Crash
Description: The database server unexpectedly crashed and required a reboot.

Title: Unauthorized Access
Description: An unauthorized person attempted to access the secure area.

Title: System Update Failure
Description: An automatic update failed causing downtime for several hours.

Title: Fire Alarm Triggered
Description: The fire alarm was triggered due to smoke detected in the kitchen.

Title: Shoplifting
Description: A shoplifting incident occurred in the Northside market.
